sentences.sContent: In this island is also found the rhinoceros, an animal less than the elephant, but larger than the buffalo.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this island is also found the rhinoceros, an animal less than the elephant, but larger than the buffalo.
sentences.sCn: 在这个岛上还能找到犀牛，一种比大象小一点的动物，可是比水牛大。

sentences.sContent: Contrary to its name, the black rhinoceros is actually grey in color.
sentences.sContent_eng: Contrary to its name, the black rhinoceros is actually grey in color.
sentences.sCn: 有别于它的名字，黑犀牛事实上是灰色的。

trans.tranOther: a large heavy African or Asian animal with thick skin and either one or two horns on its nose
